Module RMI
Package it.unipr.barbato.Model.Impl

Class ProductOfferImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.unipr.barbato.Model.Impl.ProductOfferImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductOffer, Serializable, Remote
public class ProductOfferImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ProductOffer
The ProductOfferImpl represents an implementation of the ProductOffer interface. This class provides methods to set and retrieve information about a product offer.
Author:
Vincenzo Barbato 345728
